hasEmploymentIncome.legendSingle: Do you have any income from employment?
hasEmploymentIncome.legendJoint: Do you or your partner have any income from employment?
hasEmploymentIncome.requiredSingle: Select yes if you have any income from employment.
hasEmploymentIncome.requiredJoint: Select yes if you or your partner have any income from employment.
hasEmploymentIncome.change: Change whether you have any income from employment

hasSelfEmploymentIncome.legendSinglePast: Have you had any income from self-employment since ${selfEmployedEarningsDate}?
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.legendJointPast: Have you or your partner had any income from self-employment since ${selfEmployedEarningsDate}?
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.legendSinglePresent: Do you have any income from self-employment?
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.legendJointPresent: Do you or your partner have any income from self-employment?
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.requiredSinglePast: Select yes if you have had any income from self-employment.
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.requiredJointPast: Select yes if you or your partner have had any income from self-employment.
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.requiredSinglePresent: Select yes if you have any income from self-employment.
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.requiredJointPresent: Select yes if you or your partner have any income from self-employment.
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.changeSinglePast: Change whether you have had any income from self-employment
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.changeJointPast: Change whether you or your partner have had any income from self-employment
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.changeSinglePresent: Change whether you have any income from self-employment
hasSelfEmploymentIncome.changeJointPresent: Change whether you or your partner have any income from self-employment
